description: This file defines a service class `PollService` for interacting with a backend polling API. It includes methods to get polls, create polls, and vote on polls, all performed asynchronously using `AsyncTask`. The class also defines several callback interfaces for handling results and errors. It manages HTTP requests and JSON payloads for communication with the backend.

classes.name: PollService
classes.description: Service class providing static methods to perform poll-related network operations asynchronously, including fetching, creating, and voting on polls.

methods.name: getPolls
methods.description: Fetches a list of polls from the backend asynchronously and invokes callback with the result or error.

methods.name: createPoll
methods.description: Creates a new poll with specified title and options asynchronously, returning the created poll or error.

methods.name: votePoll
methods.description: Votes on a specific poll option asynchronously, returning success status or error.
